column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: According to the National Police Force police administration
column4: 3 people were arrested on suspicion of the theft of air conditioning units and a refrigerator in point on Street 1019
column10: 31-35 are all unemployed and from Sen Sok.------A trailer
column11: 1 refrigerator and 5 air conditioners were returned to the victims.------The suspects are currently being detained at the Sen Sok district police headquarters to follow legal procedures. ------POST NEWS
